segments.text: Hey Rachael , what's up ? How is your day ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Not bad.We have had a big meeting today , remember ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , yea . I forgot.So how did it go ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Pretty well . I think the boss liked my ideas .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , I have to write the proposal . I'm pretty excited about it .
segments.speaker: S2
